programmes.show_name: Take Me To The Clouds Above!
programmes.show_description: The sound that started it all! Join us for a selection of legendary Clubland classics. Expect high-energy beats, the biggest vocal anthems and feel good party vibe for all!
Top one, nice one, get sorted! Join Steph Hirst as she takes us back, way back to a time of smiley faces, glow sticks and banging tunes. Get Ready for 30 Proper Old Skool Ravers!
Fancy a mash up after midnight? Only massive, ad free anthems to help with your insomnia! More beats, less sleep!
We give you heavy hits, vocal anthems, dirty beats and bangin' basslines. This is the 2010s at it finest!
Whether you're heading to San Antonio or dreaming of past holidays in Ibiza, superstar DJ Jeremy Healy takes us on a homage to the greatest beach anthems ever!
No excuses, stop what you are doing, turn it up and party hard with the biggest anthems and classic tracks of the noughties!
We've raided the Clubland vaults and decided to smash things up a bit! Enjoy some of the most awesome classics there are, mixed and smashed up to perfection.
Get ready for the 30 biggest Clubland classics ever to hit the airwaves. The biggest party!

programmes.show_name: Take Me To The Clouds Above!
programmes.show_description: The sound that started it all! Join us for a selection of legendary Clubland classics. Expect high-energy beats, the biggest vocal anthems and feel good party vibe for all!
We give you the build ups, the breakdowns, the vocal highs and the symphonic lows. Every track is a 'hands in the air' anthem!
Dive into a world of uplifting melodies, driving beats and breakdowns to give you shivers! This is Euphoria at its finest.
Judge Jules goes large! Get his lowdown of 1995 to 2015. The tunes we partied to, the tech that defined us and the events that shook the world!
Starting in with the vinyl hits of 80s, the CD singles of the 90s, The downloads of the 2000s and finishing with today streaming hits. This is the evolution of dance!

Fancy a mash up after midnight? Only massive, ad free anthems to help with your insomnia! More beats, less sleep!
No excuses, stop what you are doing, turn it up and party hard with the biggest anthems and classic tracks of the noughties!
Puppets, Bikinis, Singing Fish, Turtle Power, LEGO, Hamsters, Bart Simpson and putting a donk on it! This is 30 Silly Songs from the party master himself, Mr Pat Sharp.

programmes.show_name: Take Me To The Clouds Above!
programmes.show_description: The sound that started it all! Join us for a selection of legendary Clubland classics. Expect high-energy beats, the biggest vocal anthems and feel good party vibe for all!
Back with another one of those block rockin' beats! Here's 40 of the most rampant fuel filled tracks of all time! We have the beats and we're not afraid to use them.
From the fields to the clubs! Relive the rave culture with iconic tracks that defined a generation. Pure energy and essential anthems only. Ravers Unite!
Kiss FM legend Bam Bam with a mammoth session of no.1s that made the decade. From Jason Derulo in 2010 through to Dance Monkey in 2019 - all the big beats are here!
We give you heavy hits, vocal anthems, dirty beats and bangin' basslines. This is the 2010s at it finest!
We give you the 100 biggest tunes from the greatest decade in dance, the 90s. Haddaway, Sash!, Reel 2 Real, Faithless and so many more!
